com.skilltradiez.skilltraderz

Class MasterController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skilltradiez.skilltraderz.MasterController

  • public final class MasterController
extends java.lang.Object
    Activities should ideally never need to interact with the model directly. This acts as a controller that facilitates the communication from the views to the models that we possess. Assuming direct control. --Sovereign, mass effect

      • getCurrentUser

        Returns:
        User Object.

        Boolean. True/False.

      • getAllTradez

        public java.util.Set<Trade> getAllTradez()

        Set of Trade Objects.
